Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at ApartmentsApart Brussels, you'll be centrally located in Brussels, steps from Brussels Stock Exchange and minutes from St. Catherine's Square. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Halles de Saint-Gery and Jeanneke Pis.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 60 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include microwaves and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10:30 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same hotel / stay dates).

Make yourself at home in one of the 60 individually furnished guestrooms, featuring kitchens with refrigerators and stovetops. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include microwaves and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

With a stay at ApartmentsApart Brussels, you'll be centrally located in Brussels, steps from Brussels Stock Exchange and minutes from St. Catherine's Square. This family-friendly apartment is within close proximity of Halles de Saint-Gery and Jeanneke Pis.

Accommodations are located at multiple addresses. Regional attractions include:

Brussels Stock Exchange
St. Catherine's Square
Halles de Saint-Gery
Jeanneke Pis
The King's House
Royal Theatre Toone
Brussels City Hall
La Grand Place
Galeries St. Hubert
Manneken Pis Statue
Moof Museum
Jacques Brel Foundation
Cathedral of St. Michael
Square Brussels Meeting Centre
Belgian Comic Strip Center

The nearest airports are:
Brussels (ZYR-Brussels Midi Train Station)
Brussels (BRU)

The preferred airport for ApartmentsApart Brussels is Brussels (BRU).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same hotel / stay dates).
